features: 【Premium Shoulder Bag】:This leather messenger purse is made of high density 100% geniune leather cowhide excellent workmanship, vintage. wear-resistant and durable enough for your daily use. The shoulder strap of this shoulder bag is adjustable, and the longest length of the strap is about 51 inches, make your daily use more comfortable.The messenger bag adopts a magnetic buckle closure design to safely protect your inner secrets.

【Large Capacity of Crossbody Bag】: Construction: 4 main compartments / 2 main top zip pocket +1 smaller card pocket + 1 front pocket with flap + 1 detachable shoulder strap +1 removable metal carabiner. Dimensions: About 6.29"L x2.75"W x8.66"H. This crossbody bag is vintage and multifunction. Small but big enough to hold mobile phone, wallet purse, a pair of glasses, passport, 7.9inch ipad mini, keys, or other essentials.
【Occasion for Messenger Bag】:Business leather bag, casual sports bag, shoulder bag, crossbody bag, messenger bag, travel bag, sling bag etc. Perfect gift for father, husband, or male friends.

【Professional & Focus】:We are a professional leather products company with 12 years of rich experience. We have formed a selection-production-inspection-service product chain and set up a special product quality inspection team to insist on an inspection of all finished products. Customer first is an important principle we have always emphasized.

【Excellent Service】: 100% free exchange and returns.100% satisfaction guarantee warranty and friendly customer service. If you have any problem about the item, please Do not hesitate to contact us. We will be there with you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Augus is committed to providing high-quality the leather messenger bag, crossbody bag, shoulder bag products to consumers around the world! The best choice for exquisite leather bags, whether you are dressing or casual, this bag can match you perfectly. Very suitable gift recommendation for ladies and men!

Leather crossbody bag with hand strap and adjustable long shoulder strap. Both ends of the shoulder bag strap are equipped with golden metal rotating hooks, which are smooth and firm, which is easy to disassemble and use. Selected high-quality hardware reinforcement, strong oxidation resistance, simple and stylish design, adding elegance to the entire bag. The buckle-type clamshell body of leather crossbody is small, light and portable to take out of the street, and the multi-layer design allows the belongings to be placed in an orderly manner for easy access.

Scientific and reasonable capacity 2 main compartments, 1 inner zipper pocket and 1 inner pocket (for 7.9inch iPad, wallet, glasses); 1 back zipper pocket (for put bus cards, bank cards); 1 front zipper pocket (for keys and paper towels); 1 magnet buckle layer (for mobile phone); Multiple pockets can store small items, convenient to carry, practical and convenient, intimate hidden magnetic buckle, effectively protect items. Very suitable for use in the office, dating, traveling or any other daily occasions
Commuting all-match temperament The simple and clear style gives it the attribute that it can be matched with a variety of outfits.

The leather messenger bag is made of selected fabrics, and the leather is soft and stylish. It feels like touching a baby's skin with your hand. It is not easy to crease when rubbing, and you can quickly restore the shape when you let it go. The metal hanging buckle with arc grinding technology is adopted, and the shoulder strap can be detached and adjusted freely, and the style of use can be switched at any time.

We take every product seriously. Each of our products are carefully designed by excellent designers and made of high-quality leather. Passed more than ten quality inspection procedures. Excellent quality, stylish design and best service, which is why Augus can win customers’ love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent man bag
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using a man bag for several years and find them indispensable. This one is an excellent design. Very functional, plenty of pockets, attractive and masculine, well made, and a great size for everyday life. The leather feels nice and the zippers are great.My two caveats would be that I prefer an actual leather strap — one that’s not quite as wide as the strap that comes with this bag. Actual leather straps can cost as much or more than this bag, but I was able to find one on Amazon that met my preferences and (somewhat) my budget. So, that was a fairly easy “fix.” Fortunately, the strap that comes with this bag is removable (without scissors). Not all bags are made that way.The other small caveat is that the snap on the outside flap doesn’t engage very well. I’m hoping that was I break in the bag, the snap will more readily align and therefore not require a specific effort to close it each time. TBD. I will try to remember to update this in a few months.Overall, a great bag. Two thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, holds a lot
reviews.reviewText: The leather feels very premium and the zippers are really high quality as well. I use this to carry basic daily essentials, keys, wallet, iPhone Pro Max (which does fit in the front pocket without a case on), medications, and still have a whole pocket available for anything else I need. I was pleasantly surprised at how well made this bag is made for the price. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality and Value
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, quality inside and out. Perfect for carrying things you want to bring with you but don't have room in your pockets. Highly functional pockets and flap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Phone doesn't fit if it has a case on it.
reviews.reviewText: This case is well made and the perfect size with one problem. My one, Samsung A14 5G, has a protective case on it because it is very slippery without one. That case will not allow the phone to slide into the phone pocket on the case. The phone without the case barely slides into the pocket. Check size before buying this. Another thing, the magnetic latch for the flap is too small and not a very powerful magnet. Needs to be a lot more robust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the packaging that it came in. Plenty of pockets follow d was excellent. Everybody loves it! Aqui my phone my wallet and my pistol.. Plus room for a clip... Nice big ful zippers.. Excellent value highly recommended it!👍🏾

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for traveling and storing personal items

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly tough and thick leather. Bought this specifically for my EDC. Fits my phone, wallet, keys, knife etc. Even fits my concealed carry. The liner is pretty high quality, and the stitchings are tough. I've brought this pretty much anywhere, even the beach and so far has lasted for quite a while with no scratches or wear.
Bonito diseño, muy útil, muy buena calidad, su funcionalidad perfecta, le cabe todo lo indispensable como llaves, cartera, monedero, lentes etcLe pongo un 10!
